email_subject: Olympus Brio D-100 1.3 MegaPixel Digital Camera: Starting Bid $99
email_body: Don't miss out on the chance to bid on the Olympus Brio D-100 1.3 MegaPixel Digital Camera starting at just $99! This camera features 1.3 MegaPixel resolution, an 8MB Smartmedia card, and a seamless 2X digital zoom. With its 1280 x 960 pixel resolution and Olympus TruePic technology, this camera is perfect for capturing all your favorite moments. Place your bid now and don't miss out!
